mapper.select: SELECT s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_description, s.shop_address, s.shop_contact, s.shop_img, s.priority, s.create_time, s.last_edit_time, s.enable_status, s.advice, a.area_id, a.area_name, sc.category_id, sc.category_name FROM tb_shop s, tb_area a, tb_shop_category sc WHERE s.area_id=a.area_id AND s.category_id = sc.category_id AND s.shop_id = #{shopId}

SELECT s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_description, s.shop_address, s.shop_contact, s.shop_img, s.priority, s.create_time, s.last_edit_time, s.enable_status, s.advice, a.area_id, a.area_name, sc.category_id, sc.shop_category_name FROM tb_shop s, tb_area a, tb_shop_category sc WHERE s.area_id=a.area_id, AND sc.shop_category_id=s.shop_category_id, AND s.shop_id=#{shopId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_shop(owner_id, area_id, category_id, shop_name, shop_description, shop_address, shop_contact, shop_img, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status, advice) VALUES (#{owner.userId},#{area.areaId},#{shopCategory.categoryId},#{shopName}, #{shopDescription},#{shopAddress},#{shopContact},#{shopImg},#{priority}, #{createTime},#{lastEditTime}, #{enableStatus},#{advice})
